About

Ken Gee

I’m a developer who welcomes the challenge of turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive codes. Monarch(Coding) Problems Require Monarch(Kodex) Solutions.

And then implementing those codes making sure the interface fulfills its function by working as it should be and smoothly for the user.

At the present, working on learning a broad range of cross-industry skills such as programming, algorithms, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery. And as well building web application at freeCodeCamp and contributing to open source.

When I’m not coding, you’ll find me with a cup of coffee and either reading a good story or exploring the outdoors.
